title: Raise crossorganizational situational
extract: adjective. The definition of situational is a person or thing in regards to surroundings or circumstances. An example of situational is how a person reacts in different environments; called situational reactions. YourDictionary definition and usage example. Copyright © 2018 by LoveToKnow Corp.
